text: 300px The Rouen Ceramic Museum (French - musée de la Céramique de Rouen) is a museum located in the hôtel d'Hocqueville in the French city of Rouen. It has the title Museum of France. It was established in 1864, and contains a collection of around 5000 pieces. ==References== Ceramics Category:Ceramics museums in France category:1864 establishments in France
title: Rouen Ceramic Museum
